channel.title: NPC can use Magic / Range -317 Czar based-
channel.description:
is there some way that can make a NPC use Magic Spells on players and Farcast (No need)
or make them use ranged? i think its just they need gfx and anim, but i dont know how! Please help! i Rep++

item.title: NPC can use Magic / Range -317 Czar based-
item.dc:creator: @Leoiscool Leoiscool
item.description:
@Leoiscool wrote:

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:2, topic:395634”]there should be cases for those npc’s where ever there handled ive never used a project czaar and a case like this

case 2: <— NPC ID
return 1332: <----- The Attack Style It Uses.
break;

I think thats how you do it :)[/quote]

i dont have that… what base r u talkin bout?

Read full topic
item.source: NPC can use Magic / Range -317 Czar based-

item.title: NPC can use Magic / Range -317 Czar based-
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

there should be cases for those npc’s where ever there handled ive never used a project czaar and a case like this

case 2: <— NPC ID
return 1332: <----- The Attack Style It Uses.
break;

I think thats how you do it
